amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enter into a contract with a corporation or other business entity that does not disclose its political expenditures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into contracts with corporations or business entities that do not disclose their political expenditures.

action.text: Mr. Carter raised a point of order against the Eshoo amendment (A060). Mr. Carter stated that the amendment seeks to change existinlaw and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Ms. Eshoo.
